description: Oversee the development of Gaia, a data platform tailored towards geospatial data as well as real-time robot operations that’s currently used by several leading palm oil industry players.
Responsible for developing payments backend for Ario’s lending platform. Worked with bank’s EFT and ACH to process daily repayments based on the amortization schedule.
Managed and developed new features to Makerspace’s project-sharing website, Makerepo.com. Also created MakerRoom, a room-booking site for spaces in Makerspace.
